name: Gasteroids (Goat Asteroids)
description:
second game from critically acclaimed avant garde development studio Carrion Goat, creator of such classics as "like seven failed attempts to make first person shooters" and "Gong". They're back. and they're here to rock various platforms with a new banger, Gasteroids (Goat Asteroids). fueled by dariacore, the need to feel the light of creation, and dentist administered procaine, Carrion Goat has knocked it out of the park once again. enjoy Gasteroids at God's Favorite Angel's Resolution, 800x600, preferably on a CRT or any display technology thats outdated. Carrion Goat and their Benefactors have seen fit to bless us with an "Easter Egg" of sorts. click around the corners of the screen while avoiding the gasteroids and you may have some Light shed upon you. Content Warning for bass boosted shit and half life 2 spoilers. its not loud just boomy cause thats funny. 

controls-

W and S - thrust

A and D - rotate

LSHIFT - parry

SPACE - shoot

ESC - quit game

MOUSE - click buttons and do easter egg
